stories.text:
As a regular music concert and festival attendee, I like to prepare for these events by listening to all the artist's songs.

I got annoyed at the lack of playlist generation features inside of Spotify, so I created https://github.com/mcmxcdev/ConcertMash, which can easily generate a playlist for upcoming concerts based on selected artists!

It does save a lot of time that is usually spent on manually creating a playlist ;)

It is open-source and built with SvelteKit. Feel free to check it out, contributions welcome!

https://github.com/mcmxcdev/ConcertMash https://concertmash.com
stories.title: Show HN: ConcertMash – Easily generate a playlist for your upcoming concerts

stories.text:
By distributing the content through multiple locations in the world and then serving content from the location closest to you ensures that content gets loaded faster. This is the basics of the content distribution network, i.e. CDN.

This is a super useful technique to help load data faster because the transmission speed cannot increase. Understanding the basics of how computer networking works, it can take significantly more time to serve files from a single location, hence having a distributed network and intelligently serving content from nearest geographic location greatly improves user experience. You can learn more about how CDNs work here: https://uploadcare.com/blog/how-cdn-makes-your-website-faster-part-1/?utm_source=uploadcareblog&utm_medium=link
stories.title: CDN helps makes website faster
